DOC.detailed_description: The overall duration participation research study approximately 4 month . During time , three study visit require . The first visit inform consent screening , second visit baseline fitness cognitive testing , third visit follow-up fitness cognitive test 12-week physical activity monitoring program . Participants randomize one two study arm , physical activity monitoring arm flexibility balance arm . Both study arm involve wear physical activity sensor monitor physical activity duration 12 week .
